alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Payette, southwestern Gem and south central Washington Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of French Corner, or 9 miles east of Payette, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payette, Fruitland, French Corner and Paddock Valley Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River
